patthana16.81:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho
patthana16.81:1.1_1: nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha,
patthana16.81:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana16.81:2.1_1: nanabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā
